bio: Within Winterhold's icy embrace, Illea Juniper, a Snow Elf spellsword, navigates the delicate balance of magic and steel. Yearning to master both realms, her skills encompass both magic and one-handed weapons. The abyss of darkness became her proving ground as she delved into the Winterhold ruins, overcoming her fear and emerging as a spellsword unafraid of the shadows that danced within.
name: Illea Juniper
